Text:
It would be nice to leave "collections" in folders, rather than bundled in a rar. You have that option as an uploader and it would prevent me having to download 4 redundant sceneries, in order to get at Montego Bay and, who knows, others might agree.

Also, if among you collections you see "Tonga Domestic" from Pacific Islands Simulation, it is very rare and would be valued. Thanks for getting MKJS here just the same.

I thought about it , but I already posted the torrent.
Noted for next time.

Thanks first and foremost for the upload effort!!  Anyone install MKJS Montego yet? Mine is blending with the default airport, maybe a flatten/exclude file wasn't in the exe file?  Any thoughts please? Thanks
Thank you for the upload effort, lot of good stuff!!!!!
@robspeed1 I'm getting the same problem with MKJS but I'm also haveing problems with TTCP merging with the default terrain! any help out there?
